彙報.definition: to report; to give an account of; report

彙整.definition: to collect and organize (papers etc); to archive (data); to summarize (evidence etc); summary

彙映.definition: variant of 匯映|汇映[hui4 ying4]

彙算.definition: to collect data and square up; to settle accounts

彙編.definition: variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]

彙集.definition: to collect; to compile; to converge
